name: Sideral War
overview: After long years of continuous suffering, a young warrior from the sidereal planet begins his long journey through the Halson Galaxy to conclude on the Thermonuclear planet dominated by Xiler Beast leader of a group of highly sophisticated Cyber with perfect camouflages of unlikely animals. Our friend, always with his LX - 383 light and high precision weapon, and his PS - 717 propeller by nuclear reaction, you will have to use your strategy and intelligence to stop the Termical Cyber Planet wisely programmed by Xiler and his ship, small in size, but large maneuverability, to defend against enemy ships also sent by our great adversary. We will have to avoid mountains, jump craters, avoid the sodium sea by jumping from rock to rock and up and down small impediments that give our friend a long job to finish this difficult mission
